name: GuisusPocus
description:
A Game made for the LudumDare 51  from students of Image Campus!!

In this game, the little witch Sarduc must make poisons for the monster to maintain a healthy business.  But beware! If 3 monsters are angry you will close your business.

Controls: 
WASD to move
E to take/drop the ingredients


Game made by SpookyStudios:
Game Design :
Miguel Pignatiello (Itch.io)
